channel.title: Anyone know the update command for testscape?
channel.description:
anyone know the update command for testscape?
please post below if you do!!!!! ;)

item.title: Anyone know the update command for testscape?
item.dc:creator: @eekz eekz
item.description:
@eekz wrote:

ADD THIS COMMAND

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

and then in the game type ::update 10 or wat ever time

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know the update command for testscape?
